sentences.sentence: The part brachiopod genera and species are described as addendum in this paper.

sentences.sentence: Thus, this area shOuld belong to North China Region(otprovince )of the Old World Realm in respoct to reginalism of brachiopod zoogeography during lateEaly Devonian time.
